page.title: 09SHOTESHAM/HOWE HOME LIFE
page.content: The preponderence of families are nuclear though some are extended within the area. Many homes have{PETS, large gardens allowing for dogs, cats, chickens and horses, as well as for smaller animals. The same large gardens allowing for vegetable growing, the produce being used fresh in many homes. A number of people shoot for sport as well as for food. Central{HEATING}is gradually becoming more widely used. Open fires and wood_burning stoves remain in frequent use. There are a high proportion of working wives and mothers though the part time nature of this employment allows for a traditional home life in most cases. Electricity is available to all, though most use mains water some still rely on wells. LPG is the only gas available.
